resources.string:
Decline calls during online video meetings.

It checks whether any selected app is running a foreground service, which is commonly used by video conferencing apps to keep the connection alive.

It applies to both calls and messages.

Default Priority: 20

- {basic_auth(username:password)}
  For APIs that require HTTP basic authentication. For example:
  {basic_auth(111:222)}
  will be parsed to:
  Authorization: Basic MTExOjIyMg==
The maximum number of items that can be displayed in the list before a scrollbar appears.
When the scrollbar appears, this value represents the list height as a percentage of the screen.
The maximum display lines for the regex text, remaining text will be truncated and followed by an ellipsis.
The maximum display lines for the description text, remaining text will be truncated and followed by an ellipsis.
